QuestData.Title: Why So Serious?
QuestData.Description: Okay, so that not work. Well... it cheer Ken-Ken up! But pandaren still sad...$B$BWe try another old hozen remedy - this time, we go back even further than gramma, way WAY back to ancient times. Hozen still do this sometimes... mostly at parties.$B$BKen-Ken got woodworking to do - you bring him teeth! Not yours; big ones, like a panther would have!$B$BOh, and some paint! Mei might know where to find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 18 Huge Panther Fangs and 1 Jar of Pigment from Zhu Province.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Ken-Ken is hard at work carving something out of tree bark.>$B$BThis gonna be great, you'll see.
QuestData.RewardText: Just in time! All done... look!$B$B<Ken-Ken holds up a carved wooden mask with a ridiculous face.>$B$BNow we put on finishing touches and we gots a guaranteed FUN MACHINE!
